alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Wilson; Woodson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 04 at 3:22AM CDT until April 04 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR EXTREME GRASSLAND FIRE DANGER. THIS IS A POTENTIALLY DANGEROUS SITUATION FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 071, 095, AND 099... The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a Red Flag Warning for extreme grassland fire danger. This is a potentially dangerous situation, which is in effect from 10 AM this morning to 11 PM CDT this evening. * Extreme Grassland Fire Danger...Is forecast. * Extreme to Catastrophic Grassland Fire Danger...Is forecast. * Winds...South 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 22 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly and become very difficult to control. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this fire weather product.
